text: Hamcunin turo ej Pajomʙar, ʙa mijoni ummate, ki pes az onho ummathoe digar ʙudaand, ʙa pajƣamʙari firistodaem, to on ciro, ki ʙar tu vahj kardaem (ja'ne Qur'onro), ʙarojason tilovat kuni va onho ʙa jagonagii Rahmon kofir mesavand. Bigu: «U Parvardigori man ast. Allohe cuz U ma'ʙude nest. Bar Alloh tavakkal kardaam va ʙozgasti man ʙa dargohi Ust!»
